group_1.textCenter: Huh? Hey, are you okay? What happened @during your break?

group_1.textRight: [chara:303301:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Whewww... Uh, no, I'm fine.
Just gimme a minute.
*Inhale* [chara:303301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:303301:motion_0][chara:303301:lipSynch_1]*Exhale*
(I owe this to everyone... They've waited@long enough to see it!)
Okay, ready!

group_1.textLeft: A-all right then... Let's roll the cameras!
*Gulp* Now even I'm nervous.

group_1.textRight: You can do it, Sayuki...

group_1.textCenter: So everyone, make sure to come check out@the Mizuna Art Museum, 'kay?

group_1.textLeft: Huh. She was way better.

group_1.textRight: That was just the first part. She only had@to listen, so it's not that amazing.

group_1.textCenter: Just you wait. I won't be starring in any TV@shows you fools put on, not even if you beg!

group_1.textRight: Sayuki! Great job, you were so good!

group_1.textLeft: Thanks... I got through without bungling@it!

group_1.textRight: Are you okay?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...
But the important part is coming up. It's@Princess Bladebeauty's big scene.
I really need to bring my A game here...

group_1.textCenter: Time for the second half. Lights, camera!

group_1.textLeft: O-oh, okay!
Off I go!
She's pretty worn out.

group_1.textRight: She used her forbidden memorization@technique in such a short period of time.
It must've taken a huge toll on her...
I couldn't convince her not to, though.
She's dead serious about this!

group_1.textLeft: It really isn't worth putting herself@through all that...
But then I guess they weren't kidding about@how hard she works, huh.

group_1.textCenter: I shan't let you ignorant, uncultured bores@leave until you appreciate the merit of art!

group_1.narration: "O-oh no!@Low customer turnout turned the director@into a madman who holds guests hostage!"

group_1.textRight: How dare you trap people in a museum against@their will!
I'll cleave this foul problem in two!
Princess Bladebeauty has arrived!

group_1.textLeft: Perfect! She nailed it!

group_1.textRight: Keep it up, Sayuki!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall][chara:303301:effect_shake][se:3001_chara_damage]Eeeeeek!!!

group_1.textLeft: Mwahahaha!
Nothing can stand in the way of my love@of the arts!

group_1.textRight: Ugh...
"Love"? This isn't love!
This is...
(It's...what? What comes after that?)
(Something that convinces the museum@director to stop... What was it?)
She froze up!

group_1.textLeft: She forgot her line...

group_1.textRight: Oh no, Sayuki... Come on, you've got@this!

group_1.textLeft: What's wrong, Princess Bladebeauty?@Caught dead in your tracks, are you?

group_1.textRight: (He's ad-libbing!)
(The director's covering for me... That's@so sweet of him.)
(And the cameras are still rolling...)
(But I can't... I just can't remember what@my next line is.)

group_1.narration: "You're always helping me get through the@day, Sayu-Sayu."
"Keep up the amazing work. I'm a fan for@life!"
A-a-a-anyway! I'm really excited to see@you in that show coming up on TV!

group_1.textRight: (All my fans... All those people who are@cheering me on...)
(They're all waiting for me on the other@side of those cameras.)

group_1.textLeft: Ah ha ha ha ha! That's enough, Princess@Bladebeauty!
I'll teach you what makes something a@REAL work of art!

group_1.textRight: (So I have to do this!)
(I have to do whatever I can!)
I...I love this art museum!
It was here, in this museum, that I first@discovered swords and fell in love!
It was so clear how well each sword had@been cared for...
So obvious that someone wanted to protect@them and the history they bear.
That passion is what ignited my love for@them...
And my love for this museum! The Mizuna@Art Museum!

group_1.textLeft: No... No, you can't mean it!
Kids these days don't care! They say the@museum is old, dingy, useless!
But...you're telling me you could still@tell how much I cared about it?

group_1.textRight: That's right!
It's clear as day to me.
So...
You can't keep making people who love this@museum miserable.
You have to stop it, right now!

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall]G-gaaaaaah!!! All my problems... They're@melting awaaay!

group_1.textCenter: Princess Bladebeauty just cut this foul@problem right in two!

group_1.textRight: Sayuki! That was wonderful! You were@so good!

group_1.textLeft: Y-you mean it?

group_1.textRight: Look over there.
I apologize, it seems she forgot some of@her lines...

group_1.textLeft: No, no need to apologize at all. That@actually made for a great scene!
I think the fans will be delighted to hear@Sayu-Sayu's true feelings about the museum.
Let's go with that take!
Hwah! Thank goodness!

group_1.textRight: Careful. You can't get sloppy now.
We'll be here to support you!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:303300:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Thank you! You're the best!

group_1.textCenter: And that's a wrap! Great shoot, everyone!

group_1.textLeft: Sayu-Sayu did a great job.
She may be a local idol, but she's@definitely on the pro level.

group_1.textRight: You've changed your opinion like ten times.
You're right though... She was really@good. Her ad-lib was so emotional.

group_1.textLeft: Ho ho! I know, right?!
Sayuki can do just about anything when@she puts her mind to it.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* I'm so glad it went without a@hitch.
I can't wait until it airs! Right, Sayuki?[chara:303201:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:303201:cheek_0][chara:303201:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:303201:lipSynch_1]@...Sayuki?

group_1.textLeft: Hweeew...

group_1.textRight: Eek! A-are you okay?!
Wait, what?

group_1.textLeft: She's asleep. Fast asleep, with a big@happy smile on her face.

group_1.textRight: Well, she pushed herself so hard... I'm@sure her batteries are completely drained.
